title: Technology Integration Design for Innovating Higher Education Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic educational terminology and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Students, majoring in social sciences, practice instructional methods and technology integration in blended learning environments, aiming to develop field-applicable competencies

learning_goals: When designing blended instruction, learning modules that incorporate Instructional Design (ID) principles by over 80% can be developed.
Three or more interaction strategies utilizing online discussion forums and AI tutor systems can be implemented.
Content creation methods that minimize accessibility issues in Bring Your Own Device (BYOD) environments can be applied.
A rubric to measure blended learning effectiveness can be designed and peer feedback can be incorporated.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
